name: Lemon Daddy
description: Lemon Daddy is a sativa-dominant cross between the flavorful Super Lemon Haze and a resin-heavy Granddaddy Purple. Together, these two parents pass on a fresh citrus and grape aroma that lingers after the exhale. Mellow effects settle in shortly after, promoting relaxation and enhanced focus useful for any time of the day.
attributes_title: Energetic, Happy, Focused, Giggly, Relaxed, Stress, Fatigue, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid, Anxious
